articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Japan's Nikkei 225 crosses 50,000 for the first time, ahead of Takaichi-Trump meeting - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets traded higher Monday, led by South Korea, after top U.S. and Chinese trade negotiators hashed out a framework on several disputed issues.
articles.content: Japan's Nikkei 225 breached the 50,000 mark for the first time Monday as investors cheered progress in U.S.-China trade talks and strong momentum from Wall Street. The benchmark index rose 2.46% to c… [+2483 chars]
